title: Stoned Driving = Cops’ White Whale, Y2K Fashion Is Back! 2.17.22
itunes:title: Stoned Driving = Cops’ White Whale, Y2K Fashion Is Back! 2.17.22
description:
In episode 1087, Jack and Miles are joined by actor Arden Myrin to discuss Cops still don’t know how to check if drivers are stoned, a new device may change that, Early 2000s Officially Coming Back and more!

  1. Cops still don’t know how to check if drivers are stoned, a new device may change that
  2. Early 2000s Officially Coming Back


Follow: @ardenmyrin

LISTEN: Some by Steve Lacy
